description: I was not able to set new PHP projects to /var/www/html/ folder, and neither to configure global Composer. In the Snap version, those options work fine.
This package does not install
All features are orking fine, but font displayed very ugly.
summary: Working Fine but with ugly font

description: Corrupted file :checksum
When Apache took over the software from Oracle it was in my opinion not usable in the first versions. Meanwhile the software has turned into a great development environment.
Please add Java ME
No compatibility with Ruby? Is there no Ruby (full fledge free) IDE anywhere with GUI????
good app flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo
summary: Great application. I would recommend for everyone

description:
It's always the same with NetBeans; I install it, it works for a few days, nothing changes, and then suddenly there's some random weirdo bug that renders it completely unusable, accompanied by a long list of unreadable errors (if I'm lucky) which seem to change depending on the alignment of the stars (but there's always a "NullPointerException" in there somewhere).
This time, it's loading my code just fine, just not the GUI stuff (so can't run my code anyway if it has a GUI).

I have no idea if this is a NetBeans issue, a package issue, or if NetBeans is just an awkward application and hasn't been packaged correctly... What I do know is that I hate using NetBeans on Linux.
summary: Never seems to work for long on Linux

description: Works great for all my (basic) PHP needs. Since it's a flatpak it might be blocking some access, but this mostly isn't even needed in the first place. Works great and the performance is great as well.
File > Open Project would not let me reach the source files of several existing projects at /var/www/html. Whereas, version 15, installed through the Debian package manager, has no problem with this.
summary: Could not open existing source files

description: Great job Apache Foundation. One of the best OSS IDEs

I am using Netbeans not only for my private PHP development, but also in my business. It is very stable, fast, and comfortable to use. It has a little less features than PHPStorm, but I prever Netbeans because of it's very usable interface.
Until now I always installed each Netbeans manually. Glad to use the flatpak version now, so I can easily update. Thanks for providing this app!
In my opinion the best IDE for developing Java applications on all platforms (desktop, server, mobile). Especially the maven integration is just perfect!

Es una pena, el software no se sabe como se esta implementando pero es una desastre, como puede ser posible que la aplicacion pese 4GB de datos y el paquete en flatpak muestre 500 megas de datos, adicional tarda una eternidad instalando y al final sale un mensaje de error.

en el mundo de Linux tengo algunos años, pero es muy facil instalar esta aplicacion. Ademas esta llena de plugins, que no se instalan de una, y podes ir probando de a poco cada logro. Excelente programa.
No viene con JavaFX, aunque tenga instaldo en el sistema openJDK-13
la aplicación en si esta bien pero el paquete es muy pesado y tarda mucho en instalarse.

Install it, write the hello world program and be greeted by
 "Error: JAVA_HOME is not defined correctly.
 We cannot execute /usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk//bin/java" 
Waste your time in google looking for a solution, find nothing then install Eclipse from the normal software instalation
summary: Poorly configured out of the box

description: tartda mucho en instalarse, y pesa mucho
Me encanta esta aplicacion!
10 años produciendo en Netbeans
summary: Para JEE y TypeScript es lo mejor

description: Netbeans includes all the features you'd expect from a commercial IDE, for free: best-in-class Java and Maven support, clear layout and settings, nice built-in Light/Dark themes, 1st class HTML 5/JS support and many more.
summary: One of the best Java/PHP/C++ IDE

description: В общем все хорошо, НО... Проблема в самом интерфейсе. Во-первых, хотелось бы его руссифицировать, но это не принципиально. А вот сам шрифт приложения ОЧЕНЬ плохо читаемый. Как улучшить отображение пока не разобрался.
Лучшая IDE для Java. После использования всех остальных остановился именно на ней, поскольку сочетает гибкость и стабильность.
Большой проект на PHP открыл, тормозов нет. После изменения шрифта в настройках выглядит вполне неплохо, можно пользоваться. Русского языка нет.
